TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content: Kids, dont protitute yourself for teh shallow internetfames, go get some fresh air and chase some skirts! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Seriously, you can come here to collect pity rep? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Don't rep me for this.

> 
> Seriously, you can come here to collect pity rep? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
> Don't rep me for this.

Must... resist... urges....

But really, nobody comes here for the rep. As i've said before, it's not the person getting the rep's fault, it's the person who GIVES them the rep's fault.

> 
> Must... resist... urges....
> **But really, nobody comes here for the rep.** As i've said before, it's not the person getting the rep's fault, it's the person who GIVES them the rep's fault.

Ha ha. 

So the people giving rep in this thread need to exercise more restraint? Yes they do.

Rep isn't like a score in a game, it's a measure of how popular ones creations are, be they ideas about the game or crafts in the spacecraft exchange.
30 left! But i haven't got rep in like a week. I will go and make some good posts!
1 more point to 5 bars? Seriously? Guess I'll go update my american Fighter Jet pack in spacecraft exchange.

Considering how I've been acting more jerkily lately, I'd say pretty far.

What are the reputation levels needed to upgrade a level, anyway? 100 for each bar?

> 
> Considering how I've been acting more jerkily lately, I'd say pretty far.
> What are the reputation levels needed to upgrade a level, anyway? 100 for each bar?

Yep. 100 is 2 bars, 200 is 3 bars, 300 is 4 bars, 400 is 5 bars, you get the point. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
No idea, never paid it much attention, but I did notice that I used to be a "Senior Rocket Scientist" and now am a "Junior Rocket Scientist"

> 
> No idea, never paid it much attention, but I did notice that I used to be a "Senior Rocket Scientist" and now am a "Junior Rocket Scientist"

You used to be "Senior Spacecraft Engineer" Now you're "Junior Rocket Scientist"

> 
> You used to be "Senior Spacecraft Engineer" Now you're "Junior Rocket Scientist"

oh ok, I never figured out what that title was all about, some people seem to have their own custom titles.

some peoples seem to be based on rep, not sure how it all works

> 
> oh ok, I never figured out what that title was all about, some people seem to have their own custom titles.
> some peoples seem to be based on rep, not sure how it all works

Titles are based on post count, if the user doesn't change their title.

> 
> Titles are based on post count, if the user doesn't change their title.

I see, thanks for the clarification.

> 
> Yep. 100 is 2 bars, 200 is 3 bars, 300 is 4 bars, 400 is 5 bars, you get the point. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That is, until 500 points. Then it is 200 points per bar.

So, 700 points is two light green, up to 1500 points for six light green. Rep may continue past this point.

Edit: by what logic does this post get me ten reputation points?! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Seriously, it was just informational... though it proves the point about the actions of the rep giver rather than the poster.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-15T01:30:43Z" title="05/15/2015 01:30  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 15, 2015</time> by Starwhip**
Back to answering the title, I have 21 rep to go as of this post.

> 
> Yep. 100 is 2 bars, 200 is 3 bars, 300 is 4 bars, 400 is 5 bars, you get the point. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

...then I have only 9 rep. points left until my third rep. bar! *Must... resist... asking for reputation...*

...GIB REP PLOX OR I REPORT U
I am only 81 rep points away from joining the light green group! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
179 to go for me.
Welp, now I'm back at 100.

I have 39 until I have my second LGB. \*Light Green Bar.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T15:04:43Z" title="05/18/2015 03:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by Robotengineer**
  
Clarification.

**YEEEAH!** I have THREE rep. bars!

...but now I need pretty much 99 points for my fourth bar. Ah well.
699... One to go and it's killing me!
My rep counter went to an immediate halt after 183..

96...literally one more click of the button from a (semi)-well known person will kick me to the next rank. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) it's so mean

10 until the next text version, 60 until my next bar. Sigh.

Please don't rep me here. If you do want to rep me, please find something I've done which you like. Otherwise it cheapens the rep for me.
